Hi there. I have a very basic question about macros. I am trying to define a macro that generate the second method based on the first one. (something does something based on x, not only x[i])
```f(i::Int, x::Vector) = something(x[i],x)
f(x::Vector) = map(i -> f(i, x), 1:length(x))```
Any idea?
